channel.title: Adding Donator Crowns - Standard PI Base
channel.description: Ok so I've already added the donator crowns to the cache and everything (yes thier in the right location) but I dont know how to add them to your chat, for example when a donator talks, the crown would be next to his name, showing his "status". I can do it if I change my donator status to playerRights 4 but im not going through all that, I've yet to find a way to do this with the memberStatus = # method... Help?

item.title: Adding Donator Crowns - Standard PI Base
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

you mean something like this:

if(myPrivilege == 4) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=4><col=23800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 3) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=3><col=13843226>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 2) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=2><col=0191255>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 1) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=1><col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); }

don’t look to get rank that’s because i have loyalty titles

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Donator Crowns - Standard PI Base

item.title: Adding Donator Crowns - Standard PI Base
item.dc:creator: @Tesko Tesko
item.description:
@Tesko wrote:

Ok so I’ve already added the donator crowns to the cache and everything (yes thier in the right location) but I dont know how to add them to your chat, for example when a donator talks, the crown would be next to his name, showing his “status”. I can do it if I change my donator status to playerRights 4 but im not going through all that, I’ve yet to find a way to do this with the memberStatus = # method… Help?

Read full topic
